channel.title: Ray Johnson's Website
channel.description: Recent content on Ray Johnson's Website

item.title: About Ray Johnson
item.description: I am a software engineering executive. I build products, I build teams, I build business value! Hi! I’m a SVP of Engineering currently living in sunny southern california. I got my BS in Computer Science at George Washington University in D.C. and my Masters of Computer Science at Georgia Tech in Atlanta, GA. Most recently I’ve worked at a fairly large company but also three different start-ups. While I like to keep my hands dirty, I mostly spend my time building and managing teams of engineers, designers, quality assuance folks, and sometimes product and project managers.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my blog. I built this with hugo and a bunch of other services. I’ll write more about that later. For now let’s just leave it at Hello! Ray
